article_title: Why some insurers might love Medicaid more than they love producers
article_text:
Maybe hospital managers will be a little quicker to cut deals.

The Medicaid market can be complicated and terrifying, but it has its charms.

Hema Singh and other analysts at Standard & Poor's Ratings Services write about the charms in an article about the effects of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) Medicaid expansion program.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: Margins are low, political pressure is high, but poor people keep coming in the door.

Hema Singh and other analysts at Standard & Poor's Ratings Services write about the charms in an article about the effects of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) Medicaid expansion program.
The Medicaid market can be complicated and terrifying, but it has its charms.
Maybe hospital managers will be a little quicker to cut deals.
